member.summary: Create default designer RequestParams to save the report into cache

member.summary: Create the report viewer for Preview tab in the designer

member.summary: Get the URL for designer requests

member.summary: Get the URL to load the scripts, styles or images of the report designer.

member.summary: Get the URL to load the images of the report designer.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.DesignerEvent
member.summary: The event occurs for any action of the designer before it is processed.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetReport
member.summary: The event occurs when the report template is requested after running the designer.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.OpenReport
member.summary: The event occurs when the report template is opened using the file menu.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.CreateReport
member.summary: The event occurs when creating a new report template using the file menu.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.SaveReport
member.summary: The event occurs when saving the report template.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.SaveReportAs
member.summary: The event occurs when saving as file the report template.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.PreviewReport
member.summary: The event occurs before rendering the report for preview. Allowed to change the properties of the report, register the data.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetPreviewReport
member.summary: The event occurs before displaying the rendered report in the preview.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.ExportReport
member.summary: The event occurs before the exporting of the report from the preview tab.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.ExportReportResponse
member.summary: The event occurs after the report is exported from the preview tab.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.Exit
member.summary: Fires when the user pressed Exit in the file menu.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetRequestParams
member.summary: Get the all request parameters of the report designer.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetActionReportObject
member.summary: Get the current report template for the current action of the component. Returns report template from the client for OpenReport action, new report template for CreateReport action, copy of the report template for PreviewReport action. Otherwise returns report template from the cache.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetActionReportObject(Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiRequestParams)
member.summary: Get the current report template for the current action of the component. Returns report template from the client for OpenReport action, new report template for CreateReport action, copy of the report template for PreviewReport action. Otherwise returns report template from the cache. The specified request parameters will be used.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetReportObject
member.summary: Get the current report template from the cache.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetReportObject(Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiRequestParams)
member.summary: Get the current report template from the cache. The specified request parameters will be used.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetExportSettings
member.summary: Get the export settings from the dialog form of the report preview.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetExportSettings(Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiRequestParams)
member.summary: Get the export settings from the dialog form of the report preview. The specified request parameters will be used.

member.summary: Returns true if specified stream contains packed report.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.IsEncryptedFile(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Returns true if specified stream contains encrypted report.

member.summary: Returns true if specified stream contains packed report.

member.summary: Gets or sets a path to the localization file for the designer.

member.summary: Gets or sets the report showing zoom. The default value is 100.

member.summary: Gets or sets a date format for datetime parameters in parameters panel. To use a server date format please set the StiDateFormatMode.FromServer or "FromServer" string value. The default is the client browser date format.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.Report
member.summary: Gets or sets a report object which to edit in the designer.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.CacheHelper
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the StiCacheHelper class that will be used for report caching on the server side.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.RequestTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets time which indicates how many seconds the client side will wait for the response from the server side. The default value is 30 seconds.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.CacheTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets time which indicates how many minutes the report will be stored in the server cache or session. The default value is 10 minutes.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.CacheMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode of the report caching.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.CacheItemPriority
member.summary: Specifies the relative priority of report, stored in the system cache.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.AllowAutoUpdateCache
member.summary: Allows the designer to update the cache automatically. The cache will be updated about once every three minutes if there are no actions in the designer.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.UseRelativeUrls
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that the designer will use relative or absolute URLs.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.PortNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which specifies the port number to use in the URL. A value of 0 defines automatic detection. A value of -1 removes the port number.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.PassQueryParametersForResources
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which enables or disables the transfer of URL parameters when requesting the scripts and styles of the designer.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.ShowServerErrorPage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which enables or disables the display of the detailed server error in the preview.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.UseCompression
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which enables or disables the GZip compression of requests to the server. This allows to reduce the volume of Internet traffic, but slightly slows down the designer actions.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.UseCacheForResources
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which enables caching for designer scripts and styles.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.AllowAutoUpdateCookies
member.summary: Allows the designer to update the cookies automatically on every request to the server. By default, cookies are set when creating the designer, if they are not specified in the report.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that toolbar will be shown in the designer.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.HtmlLexicalAnalyzer.SkipWhiteSpace
member.summary: skips whitespace in the input string leaves the first non-whitespace character available in the NextCharacter property this may be the end-of-file character, it performs no checking

member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.JSON
member.summary:
This class encodes and decodes JSON strings. http://www.json.org/
JSON uses Arrays and Objects. These correspond here to the datatypes ArrayList and Hashtable. All numbers are parsed to doubles.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.JSON.Decode(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value
member.returns: An ArrayList, a Hashtable, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.JSON.Decode(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value; and fills 'success' with the successfullness of the parse.
member.returns: An ArrayList, a Hashtable, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.JSON.Encode(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts a Hashtable / ArrayList object into a JSON string
member.returns: A JSON encoded string, or null if object 'json' is not serializable
